title: Dandelion Zyra Skin
body: i LOVE zyra and i LOVE all kinds of flowers, i wish riot would make this!

replies.body: This looks awesome! I'd love to see some of the white fluffy parts of a dandelion included in this, too!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fvob3Nil,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-15T18:49:25.259+0000)
>
> This looks awesome! I'd love to see some of the white fluffy parts of a dandelion included in this, too!

After she uses her passive she should instantly wither into a white dandelion and blow away!
or you could put it into her recall maybe ?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fvob3Nil,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-15T18:49:25.259+0000)
>
> This looks awesome! I'd love to see some of the white fluffy parts of a dandelion included in this, too!

\*imagines Zyra with dandruff\*
that could be the shot you fire when her passive activates and it explodes into the seeds at the end that drift off into the wind.
I think it'd be neat to make her plants have the white fluffy dandelion heads o3o
Finally a Zyra skin idea I can get behind!  Getting a bit bored of the persistent ghost bride/spooky ideas.

My allergies!

Seriously that's a nice vibrant concept. I'm sure you could do more with her base too - maybe make her look a little hippie or spirit-grove with flowers in her hair?

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fvob3Nil,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-05-16T06:04:47.152+0000)
>
> My allergies!
> 
> Seriously that's a nice vibrant concept. I'm sure you could do more with her base too - maybe make her look a little hippie or spirit-grove with flowers in her hair?

um, i didnt make it, i found it online and i got too excited cause i love flowers and i love zyra and thought i'd share it. sorry if i mislead you (or anyone) into thinking i made this! D: i wish i knew how to make stuff like this but i cant ;-; sorry again TT-TT
What a beautiful skin! I barely play Zyra but it would be a MUST buy.
Yes, actually. In fact ALL of my yes. I don't even HAVE Zyra at this point (she's next or one down the line for me) and I would insta-buy that skin if it came out.
When read Dandelion thinked Dandelion the Bard from the Witcher. Fking Hype.

I'm kinda torn between this and that death blossom idea that was going around a while back. Both look so cool, and have so many cool things that could be done.
be really cool to make this a 1350 skin and put in some new particles for her stuff, mostly based around the dandelion seeds. Her plants could wither like the flower over time and turn into the fluffy thing we know and blow, or just wilt like most flowers. 
her seed pods would make the most sense to be the little white thing. Since they die when things walk on it, it would kinda just make sense that they be like that so they can be blown away when they hit them. 
her ult could also stem (heh) from the seedlings (the actual flower ones, not hers), and rather than having creeping vines, it could be the seedlings spreading throughout the AoE before sprouting into a massive dandelion and launching champs up. or it could be the dandelion's petals instead, just creeping out from the center. Both could be cool if done right

Brilliant concept, by the way. Zyra has some of the prettiest skin potentials out there, but this is definitely one of the good ones!
i like the ulty idea, lets spread the seed in a pattern to look pretty XD
I just realized how good chromas for Zyra would be!
This look nice and all but i would rather have them make elderwood zyra. It be like river spirit Nami but with plants I mean just look at bard.
Zyra Chroma confirmed.

I have an idea similar to this for Lissandra. 'Lifebloom Lissandra' or something.

I like the dandelion idea. The W seeds should be the white puffballs though, otherwise it feels more like 'sunflower' Zyra.
More like Forsythia Zyra.

> [{quoted}](name=CircusT4ffy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fvob3Nil,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-15T13:29:23.529+0000)
>
> More like Forsythia Zyra.

yesss ^^
Isn't that more of sunflower theme than dandelion? But it still looks amazing and I would buy.

yes please! i agree with everyone who is suggesting that they mature into the second phase of dandelioning and drift away... 

if they are not going to do that, sunflowers would be better, because they have richer colours and more interesting faces.

how about a whole bouquet of flower skins?
~ poppy flower Poppy
~ bird of paradise Azir
~ water lily Rek'sai
~ pitcher plant Zac
maybe her q can FLUFF into those white thingy after it has like burst to damage :3, same goes with her ulty when it flip the enemy XD

i think her hair style could be change or even wear a dandalion hat or something XD, i dunno wat style but :3, i would love it that when her health bar drop to 50% her abilty and she starting to change into a white+yellow dandalion and when her health bar reaches 15%, her apperance and ability completley change into a white dandalion XD and when she dies she look like a giant white dandalion connon that shoot fluff out (i randomize abit, lolz) hehehehehe. Maybe a legendary skin? it would be cool XD

{{champion:143}}
I'm allergic to these ;_;
now how long was the last skin was release? -3- she need new skin, bruh! XD
Great recolor. I love it :3
Someone needs to make this, I would use this even as a custom skin.  Its such a simple yet beautiful addition to a well established character visual, love it.
-- brought to you by Mt. Dew

I think this is a wonderful skin concept for Zyra that is a refreshing break from the 'creepy' ideas submitted for her in the past. The artist did an amazing job with the presentation of the skin, and I love the addition of how the spells look. This is definitely one of the better skins that I've seen, and I hope that Riot considers making this available. I've never played Zyra, but I think I can speak for a lot of people when I say that I would learn just to show off this wonderful skin.

But dandelions aren't flowers! THE SKIN IS RUINED NUUUUUU.
(I'd support this skin though)
Looks like they just recolored her.
